DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine effect pneumatic compression device ( PCDs ) central blood volume hemodialysis patient . We hypothesize PCDs help maintain central blood volume , therefore prevent sudden decrease blood pressure hemodialysis .
DOC.criteria: hemodialysis least 3 month hemodialysis least 3 time per week dialyze central venous catheter vascular access dysfunction peripheral vascular disease active medical issue unable provide inform consent
